casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the INVOLUNTARY TERMINATION OF the PARENT-CHILD RELATIONSHIP OF: A.S. (Minor Child)
And
C.S. (Mother) and B.S. (Father), Appellants-Respondents,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 69A04-1712-JT-2905 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED April 24, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

RILEY , J.

Affirmed.

MAY, J., Concurs.

MATHIAS, J., Concurs.
